openerSection: The ICICI Bank Instant Platinum Credit Card is a secured credit card, issued against a fixed deposit. The card caries zero renewal fee and earns you Reward points every time you make a purchase using it. Moreover, to let you save more on other categories, the card provides amazing discounts on dining and movies keeping your requirements in mind.

Other than these benefits mentioned, you can save on fuel transactions as the card comes with a fuel surcharge waiver. More of its benefits include a low-interest rate on revolving credit. To get full details about the ICICI Bank Instant Platinum Credit Card, advantages, and fees & charges, refer to the details given below:
cardTitle: ICICI Bank Instant Platinum Credit Card
andThereIsMore: It is a secured credit card that is issued against a fixed deposit.
2 Reward Points for every Rs. 100 you spend with the card (except on utilities, insurance and fuel).
1 Reward Point for every Rs. 100 you spend on fuel purchases.
Minimum 15% off on dining transactions at partner restaurants under the ICICI Bank Culinary Treats Program.
25% discount on movie tickets on BookMyShow on purchasing 2 movie tickets in a single transaction (max twice in a month).
1% surcharge waived on fuel purchases at all fuel stations all over India for transactions of up to Rs. 4,000.

rewardsPoints: 2 Reward Points for every Rs. 100 you spend with the card (except on utilities, insurance and fuel).
1 Reward Point for every Rs. 100 you spend on fuel purchases.

Movie & Dining: 25% discount on movie tickets (up to Rs. 100) on booking a minimum of 2 tickets in a single transaction on BookMyShow. Discount can be availed for a maximum of two times in a month.
Reward Redemption: The Reward Points are redeemable for gifts/shopping vouchers and for purchasing products from the Rewards Catalog.
Zero Liability Protection: For any fraudulent transaction done on the card, the cardholder will not be liable for any unauthorized transaction.

Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver for all fuel transactions up to Rs. 4,000
Cash Advance Charge: 2.5% of the cash amount transacted (minimum of Rs. 300)
